description: Sheffield United: Will Iliman Ndiaye stay or go? It's Blades Heaven
title: Sheffield United: Will Iliman Ndiaye stay or go? It's Blades Heaven
title_page: Sheffield United: Will Iliman Ndiaye stay or go? It's Blades Heaven - BBC Sport
maintext:
Pre-season is in full flow for Sheffield United. There's been some patchy form and of course, a tonne of transfer chat.
Join Adam Oxley and former Blades striker Carl Asaba as they discuss the future of United's star man among a range of topics.
